trans-unit.source: Describes how to install and configure <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>. Includes a self-study tutorial for users new to Derby and a quick-start guide for experienced JDBC users. This guide introduces the <codeph>dblook</codeph>, <codeph>ij</codeph>, and <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> tools, and the libraries and scripts that are included with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: Describes how to install and configure <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.
Includes a self-study tutorial for users new to Derby and a quick-start guide for experienced JDBC users.

This guide introduces the <codeph>dblook</codeph>, <codeph>ij</codeph>, and <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> tools, and the libraries and scripts that are included with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

target.mrk: Describes how to install and configure <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.
Includes a self-study tutorial for users new to Derby and a quick-start guide for experienced JDBC users.

This guide introduces the <codeph>dblook</codeph>, <codeph>ij</codeph>, and <codeph>sysinfo</codeph> tools, and the libraries and scripts that are included with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: Describes the functionality and features of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> common to all deployments, such as <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>'s JDBC and SQL specifics, deploying <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> applications, working with properties, security, and other advanced features.

target.mrk: Describes the functionality and features of <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> common to all deployments, such as <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>'s JDBC and SQL specifics, deploying <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> applications, working with properties, security, and other advanced features.

trans-unit.source: Documents the implementation of the SQL language in . This guide provides reference information about the JDBC and JTA implementations, keywords, system tables, properties, and SQLExceptions in .

trans-unit.source: This guide offers performance tips, an in-depth discussion of performance, and information about the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> optimizer.

seg-source.mrk: This guide offers performance tips, an in-depth discussion of performance, and information about the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> optimizer.

trans-unit.source: Describes how to use the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools such as <codeph>dblook</codeph>, <codeph>ij</codeph>, and <codeph>sysinfo</codeph>.

seg-source.mrk: Describes how to use the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools such as <codeph>dblook</codeph>, <codeph>ij</codeph>, and <codeph>sysinfo</codeph>.

trans-unit.source: Part One of this guide discusses configuring servers, how to program client applications, and database administration. In addition, some systems might require administrative tasks such as backing up databases. These tasks are independent of any server framework but are unique to multi-user or large systems.

seg-source.mrk: Part One of this guide discusses configuring servers, how to program client applications, and database administration.
In addition, some systems might require administrative tasks such as backing up databases.
These tasks are independent of any server framework but are unique to multi-user or large systems.

target.mrk: Part One of this guide discusses configuring servers, how to program client applications, and database administration.
In addition, some systems might require administrative tasks such as backing up databases.
These tasks are independent of any server framework but are unique to multi-user or large systems.

trans-unit.source: Part Two of this guide discusses administrative tasks such as backing up and restoring databases, importing and exporting data, storing Java code in the database, and debugging deadlocks.

seg-source.mrk: Part Two of this guide discusses administrative tasks such as backing up and restoring databases, importing and exporting data, storing Java code in the database, and debugging deadlocks.

target.mrk: Part Two of this guide discusses administrative tasks such as backing up and restoring databases, importing and exporting data, storing Java code in the database, and debugging deadlocks.

trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> API Reference

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> API Reference

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> API Reference

trans-unit.source: An API Reference that is automatically generated for all public <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> classes. No reference is provided for the JDBC API, which is part of the Java Platform, Standard Edition. For more information about the classes in the API, see the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph></cite>.

seg-source.mrk: An API Reference that is automatically generated for all public <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> classes.
No reference is provided for the JDBC API, which is part of the Java Platform, Standard Edition.
For more information about the classes in the API, see the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph></cite>.

target.mrk: An API Reference that is automatically generated for all public <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> classes.
No reference is provided for the JDBC API, which is part of the Java Platform, Standard Edition.
For more information about the classes in the API, see the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph></cite>.

trans-unit.source: You can access the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#vers/fullversionnumber"></ph> manuals and API Reference from the <xref format="html" href="http://db.apache.org/derby/manuals/index.html" importance="high" scope="external">Apache Derby: Documentation</xref> page on the Apache Derby Web site. The product documentation is also installed with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>. The manuals are installed in the <filepath>docs</filepath> subdirectory and the API Reference is installed in the <filepath>javadoc</filepath> subdirectory.

The product documentation is also installed with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.
The manuals are installed in the <filepath>docs</filepath> subdirectory and the API Reference is installed in the <filepath>javadoc</filepath> subdirectory.

target.mrk: You can access the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#vers/fullversionnumber"></ph> manuals and API Reference from the <xref format="html" href="http://db.apache.org/derby/manuals/index.html" importance="high" scope="external">Apache Derby: Documentation</xref> page on the Apache Derby Web site.
The product documentation is also installed with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.
